title: Chapter LVIII - New York State Teachers' Retirement System
content:
Chapter LVIII - New York State Teachers' Retirement System

State Regulations

Part 5000 - Membership (§ 5000.1 to 5000.2)

Part 5001 - Service Credit (§ 5001.1 to 5001.8)

Part 5002 - Credit For Prior/previous Service (§ 5002.1 to 5002.8)

Part 5003 - Computation Of Final Average Salary (§ 5003.1 to 5003.6)

Part 5004 - Loans (§ 5004.1 to 5004.12)

Part 5005 - Applications For Retirement (§ 5005.1 to 5005.6)

Part 5006 - Cessation Of Membership (§ 5006.1 to 5006.2)

Part 5007 - Refund Of Contributions Of Members Whose Date Of Membership Is Prior To July 27, 1976 (§ 5007.1 to 5007.4)

Part 5008 - Transfers Of Membership (§ 5008.1 to 5008.4)

Part 5009 - Vesting (deferred Retirement) (§ 5009.1 to 5009.6)

Part 5010 - Contributions Of Members With A Date Of Membership On Or After July 27, 1976 (§ 5010.1 to 5010.4 to 5010.5)

Part 5011 - Group Life Insurance (§ 5011.1 to 5011.5)

Part 5012 - Savings Accounts For Monies Due Certain Beneficiaries (§ 5012.1 to 5012.7)

Part 5013 - Inter-vivos Or Testamentary Trust As Beneficiary (§ 5013.1 to 5013.3)

Part 5014 - Options (§ 5014.1 to 5014.6)

Part 5015 - Duties Of Employers (§ 5015.1 to 5015.5)

Part 5016 - Election Of Delegates To Annual Convention (§ 5016.1 to 5016.4)

Part 5017 - Amendment Of Rules And Regulations (§ 5017.1)

Part 5018 - Actuarial Assumptions (§ 5018.1 to 5018.6)

Part 5019 - Access To Public And Personal Records (§ 5019.1 to 5019.9)

Part 5020 - Disability Retirement Determinations (§ 5020.1 to 5020.5)

Part 5021 - Election Of System Retiree To The Retirement Board (§ 5021.1 to 5021.8)

Part 5022 - Direct Rollover Of Eligible Rollover Distributions (§ 5022.1 to 5022.3)

Part 5023 - Employment Of Retired Teachers (§ 5023.1 to 5023.3)

Part 5024 - Accelerated Death Benefit (§ 5024.1 to 5024.3)

Part 5025 - Reinstatement Of A Prior Membership In A Public Retirement System (§ 5025.1 to 5025.4)

Part 5026 - Charter Schools (§ 5026.1 to 5026.4)

Part 5027 - Advisory Committees (§ 5027.1 to 5027.3)

Part 5028 - Mandated Distributions (§ 5028.1 to 5028.2)

Part 5029 - Electronic Signatures and Filing of Documents (§ 5029.1 to 5029.4)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
